name: Percipio
description:
In Percipio you twist gravity to find your way through floating cities in the sky.

Percipio is a colorful, joyful, and beautiful puzzle platformer. 12 creative levels pose increasingly complex puzzles as you navigate a gorgeous floating world.

Features

  • Clever and unique puzzle mechanic
  • 3 beautifully designed worlds
  • 12 mind-bending levels
  • Around 1–3 hours playtime

 

Soundtrack

Percipio has a rich, orchestral soundtrack composed by Eli Evans.

Get the soundtrack here.
